Package model

Interface IStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DCAS
    public interface IStrategy
    The interface Strategy which has the method investmentStrategy to decide which stocks to invest in.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void investmentStrategy​(java.lang.String ticker, double investmentAmount, java.lang.String startDate, java.lang.String endDate, int portfolioNumber, int frequency, IStockMarketModel model, User user)
      Invest in a particular portfolio.

    • Method Detail

      • investmentStrategy

        void investmentStrategy​(java.lang.String ticker,
                        double investmentAmount,
                        java.lang.String startDate,
                        java.lang.String endDate,
                        int portfolioNumber,
                        int frequency,
                        IStockMarketModel model,
                        User user)
        Invest in a particular portfolio.
        Parameters:
        ticker - the ticker
        investmentAmount - the investment amount
        startDate - the start date
        endDate - the end date
        portfolioNumber - the portfolio number
        frequency - the frequency
        model - the model
        user - the user
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - the parse exception if parsing fails.
